SEARCH
Module com.example.samplesalad
Package com.example.samplesalad.model

Class Sequencer

java.lang.Object
com.example.samplesalad.model.Sequencer
public class Sequencer extends Object
Manages the arrangement and playback of patterns, enabling the user to record, play, and edit sequences of pad events over time.
